definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

pinyin: dui4 qiang3 ji1 ben3 jia3 suan1 zhi3
an1 ji1 jia3 suan1 zhi3 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
lin2 ben3 er4 jia3 suan1 zhi3

sentences.english: Chances are it contains phthalates and are out gassing chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它非常可能含有鄰苯二甲酸鹽，且正在揮發化學物。

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸鉬和鈣化合物在潤滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: Calcium formate may offer significant advantages as a dietary calcium supplement.
sentences.chinese: 提示甲酸鈣可能是一種極有優勢的鈣補充劑。

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 沒有苯甲酸酯，鋁，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐劑苛刻。

sentences.english: Relationship between photocatalytic degradation of benzoic acids and reaction with hydroxyl radical.
sentences.chinese: 苯甲酸類光催化降解和羥基自由基反應的關係。

sentences.english: Last year, the company said it was removing dibutyl phthalate .
sentences.chinese: 去年，該公司稱要從指甲油中去掉鄰苯二甲酸二丁酯。

sentences.english: All retinoids leave you extra vulnerable to UV damage.
sentences.chinese: 所有維甲酸都使你額外容易地受到紫外線的傷害。

sentences.english: That's what's left when formic acid loses a hydrogen ion.
sentences.chinese: 甲酸失去氫離子便形成甲酸鹽。

sentences.english: That's what's left when formic acid loses a hydrogen ion.
sentences.chinese: 甲酸失去氫離子便形成甲酸鹽。

sentences.english: A fast and convenient method for the determination of trace residues of organophosphorus and(carbamate) pesticides in pond water was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 測定池塘水中有機磷和氨基甲酸酯農藥殘留摺合總量。

sentences.english: Transitional metal complexes of pyromellitic acid were synthesized by homogeneous precipitation method, and characterized by TG, element analysis and FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 用均勻沉澱法合成了均苯四甲酸過渡金屬配合物。

sentences.english: A method of producing pyromellitic dianhydride.
sentences.chinese: 一種均苯四甲酸二酐的生產方法。

sentences.english: Why should the MBA be added as the internal standard in the test?
sentences.chinese: 實驗中添加內標物鄰甲基苯甲酸的目的是什麼？

sentences.english: One-Pot Preparation of N-Carbamate Protected Amino Acids via Azide.
sentences.chinese: 氨基甲酸經疊氮化保護氨基酸的一勺燴製備。

sentences.english: FREE of Dyes, Perfume, Lanolin, Parabens and Formaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 不含染料，香水，羊毛脂，對羥基苯甲酸酯和甲醛。

sentences.english: Ammonium formate and sodium formate are the suitable hydrogen donors.
sentences.chinese: 甲酸銨和甲酸鈉是優良的氫源。
